title: Drawing, "Design for Chicken Point Cabin, Hayden Lake, Idaho:  Building Section", September 8, 2000
medium: Graphite, pen and red ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right:  Olson Sunberg Kundig Allen Architects/108 First Avenue South Fourth Floor/Seattle, Washington 98104
signed: In graphite, lower right:  Tom Kundig
inscribed: In graphite, clockwise from top:  big door; Larson / 1/8" = 1'0"/ 9.18.00; counterweight; along right edge, contour heights:  275/265/255/245/236
provenance: Tom Kundig; Olson Kundig Architects, Seattle, WA, 2001-March 2010

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Chicken Point Cabin, Hayden Lake, Idaho:  Building Section", September 8, 2000.
September 8, 2000. Graphite, pen and red ink on tracing paper. Gift of Tom Kundig. 2010-10-2.
